Analytics

Responsive landing page for data management and analytics platform
Overview

To design and develop a landing page which would highlight key features of the Metaps Analytics platform. Each section must capture the benefit of each demonstrated feature.

Process & Involvement
  • Wireframe and prototype creation
  • Art direction and branding
  • UI design and iconography
  • Dashboard graphic data simulation and asset production
  • Front-end development and debugging
Focus Point

Allow the user to quickly view and understand key features of the dashboard within a constrained amount of screen space.

Focus Solution

Integrate a center-aligned carousel, which is both responsive and slide-enabled for mobile viewing.

Visit

Rebranded under metaps.com as of June 2015.
